name: Audit Name
gustmessage: Thank you for choosing our hospital for your healthcare needs. We constantly work to improve and meet your expectations. To serve our patients better, kindly spare a few minutes to fill out this feedback form. Your opinion is of immense value to us.
detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
happythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
unhappythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
antibiotic: Has the patient's identity been confirmed by verifying the ID band?
checklist: Has the surgical site been marked?
bundle_care: Has the informed consent been completed and documented?
time_out: Has the availability of artificial dentures, eyes, or other appliances been checked?
unplanned_return: Have HIV, HBsAg, and HCV tests been completed?
last_oral: Has the time of last oral intake (fluid/food) been mentioned?
patients_weight: Has the patients weight been documented?
urine_void: Has the time of urine voiding been documented?
anaesthesia: Has the anaesthesia safety check been completed?
drug_allergy: Has the patients drug allergy history been verified?
prophylaxis: Has antibiotic prophylaxis been verified as given prior to surgery?
antibiotic_given: Was the antibiotic given within the last 60 minutes before surgery?
thromboprophylaxis: Has it been checked whether thromboprophylaxis has been ordered?
anaesthesia_professionals: Have the surgeon, anaesthesia professionals, and nurse verbally confirmed the incision time, patient identity, surgical site, and procedure?
clinical_events: Have the anticipated clinical events been reviewed by the surgeon, anaesthesia team, and nursing team?
anticipated_equipment: Have any anticipated equipment issues or concerns been reviewed?
prosthesis: Has it been confirmed whether any prosthesis or special equipment is required and available for the surgery?
imaging: Has the display of essential imaging been checked and confirmed?
procedure_name: Has the name of the procedure been recorded?
instruments_counts: Have the counts of instruments, sponges, needles, and other items been checked and confirmed?
closure_time: Has the closure time been documented?
specimen_labeling: Has the specimen labeling been completed with the correct patient name?
equipment_report: Are there any equipment problems that need to be addressed or reported?
patients_recovery: Have the surgeon, anaesthesia professionals, and nurse reviewed the key concerns for the patients recovery and ongoing management?
